item.title: canvas api test
item.description: loop 1const canvas = document.getElementById("viewport"); 2const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d", {"alpha":false}); 3const w = canvas.width; 4const h = canvas.height; 5const pbuf = [0,0,0,0]; 6var i=0, j=0, x=0, y=0, rx=0, ry=0; 7 8const _SIN_LK_RES = 20; 9const _SIN_LK = Array.
